entities.description: The relationship of the victim to the offender or another related party.
The numerical count or identifier of the offender involved.
The unweighted frequency count of each category in the survey data.
Data points that are missing or not provided in the survey responses.
The total number of survey cases considered in the dataset.
The number of valid survey responses or cases out of the total considered.

relationships.description: Specifies the relationship between the victim and another party, such as a stepsibling, offender, or acquaintance.
Identifies the offender by a numerical count or identifier in the survey.
Defines the unweighted frequency count for each survey category.
Indicates the data points that are missing or not provided for each survey category.
Defines the total number of cases analyzed in the survey dataset.
Indicates the number of valid responses from the total survey cases.
